name: Registry Mechanic Backup File
summary: Learn about .RMBAK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: An example RMBAK file is ntuser.dat.rmbak, which is a backup of the user registry file ntuser.dat.
NOTE: PC Tools Registry Mechanic was retired on December 4, 2013. However, past versions of the software are still available for download.

description: Backup file created by Registry Mechanic, a program used for optimizing the Windows registry and computer performance; stores a backup copy of important registry system files before they are modified.
